Package at.ac.acdh.profile_parser

This package represents API for parsing CLARIN Profiles (XSDs).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CMDI1_1_ProfileParser
    This class is responsible for parsing CMDI 1.1 profiles
    CMDI1_2_ProfileParser
    This class is responsible for parsing CMDI 1.2 profiles
    CMDINode
    This class is similar to CRElement and it contains information about concepts and components.
    CMDINode.Component
    This class represents component from CLARIN Component Registry with name and unique id.
    CRElement
    This class is internal representation of elements found in CLARIN CMDI profiles.
    ParsedProfile
    This class keeps information from processed CLARIN profile and provides API for analyzing xpaths, concepts and components found in one profile Information are kept in map(xpath, CMDINode)
    ParsedProfileFactory
    This class is responsible for creating proper parser, based on CMDI version, and to return instance of ParsedProfile to caller.
    ProfileParser
    Abstract class responsible for parsing CLARIN profile from URL.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CRElement.NodeType
    This enum represents internal classification of elements.

Package at.ac.acdh.profile_parser Description

This package represents API for parsing CLARIN Profiles (XSDs).

ParsedProfile class represents a parsed profile and keeps information about found xpaths, concepts and components as well as relations between them.

Call ParsedProfileFactory.parse(java.lang.String, boolean) method with url of xsd to obtain instance of parsed profile

Author:
dostojic
